name: Tetris Championship Edition
overview: Of all the versions of Tetris created for the ZX Spectrum, Tetris 2 by Frantisek Fuka is probably the best. It not only incorporates the possibility of two simultaneous players, extra pieces and special levels, but it also implements many of the improvements in gameplay of the arcade and consoles, such as the controlled drop of pieces and the possibility of correcting positions at the last moment. Now TheShich presents us with an extensive modification to the version of Viktor Drozd (with extra levels), which is still in development but already includes juicy modifications.
